div.p: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/participant-type defines the following codes:

tr.td: A translator who is facilitating communication with the patient during the encounter.
A person to be contacted in case of an emergency during the encounter.

description.value: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

definition.value: A translator who is facilitating communication with the patient during the encounter.
A person to be contacted in case of an emergency during the encounter.
